block.p: ''It has become increasingly apparent, during the course of this week, in some ways that it might not have been before, that my presence as the district attorney in Durham is not furthering the cause of justice.''
MICHAEL B. NIFONG, district attorney of Durham County, N.C., announcing that he will resign over his handling of sexual assault accusations against three former Duke University lacrosse players. [A1]
